text:
@DineshDSouza True, but the climate change pushers will never alter their stance no matter how much evidence says they’re wrong.
Why would the fake “medical experts” be any different?
I certainly won’t hold my breath.
And, .. the way they’re logging covid19 deaths is to maximize the numbers
